artist: Attributed to Master ER; After Jacob Binck
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure swooning against a tree, looking dramatically to his R at a grotesque, decaying figure with skull-like face and long hair who pulls at his arm; hourglass at figure's feet

Date

in pencil on verso: Monogrammist E.R. | De illegible date in plate at upper left, possible 15
title: Death and the Foot Soldier
